document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2021-09
document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MODIFYING CHAPTER 16.08 OF THE CALIFORNIA HISTORIC BUILDING CODE OF THE MUNICIPAL CODE TO ADD SECTION 16.08.030 TO PROVIDE FOR APPLICATION OF THE HISTORIC BUILDING CODE TO DESIGNATED SITES OF THE NAPA VALLEY RUINS & GARDENS AS A PORTION OF THE WATSON RANCH SPECIFIC PLAN AND SUCH OTHER SITES AND PLACES AS MAY BE DESIGNATED BY RESOLUTION OF THE CITY COUNCIL
